markdown:
**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 369 2.0 **Traditions** [Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4) **Deities** [Diomazul](/Deities.aspx?ID=614), [General Susumu](/Deities.aspx?ID=306), [Genzaeri](/Deities.aspx?ID=342), [Gorum](/Deities.aspx?ID=283), [Lady Razor](/Deities.aspx?ID=661), [Malthus](/Deities.aspx?ID=528), [Mrtyu](/Deities.aspx?ID=543), [Raumya](/Deities.aspx?ID=619), [Scal](/Deities.aspx?ID=410), [Skode](/Deities.aspx?ID=495), [Szuriel](/Deities.aspx?ID=392), [Zjar-Tovan](/Deities.aspx?ID=360) **Area** 30-foot cone or 10-foot emanation **Defense** Reflex --- You swing a weapon you're holding, and the weapon magically multiplies into duplicates that swipe at all creatures in either a cone or an emanation. This flurry deals four dice of damage to creatures in the area. This damage has the same type as the weapon and uses the same die size. Determine the die size as if you were attacking with the weapon; for instance, if you were wielding a two-hand weapon in both hands, you'd use its [two-hand](/Traits.aspx?ID=198) damage die. **Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The target takes half damage.
**Failure** The target takes full damage.
**Critical Failure** The target takes double damage and is subject to the weapon's [critical specialization effect](/Rules.aspx?ID=235). --- **Heightened (+1)** Add another damage die.
name: Weapon Storm

<additional-info>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
 

**Area** 30-foot cone or 10-foot emanation

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
Reflex

 
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Multiply a weapon you hold and attack many creatures with it.
</summary>
summary: Multiply a weapon you hold and attack many creatures with it.
summary_markdown: Multiply a weapon you hold and attack many creatures with it.
text: Weapon Storm Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 369 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Deities Diomazul, General Susumu, Genzaeri, Gorum, Lady Razor, Malthus, Mrtyu, Raumya, Scal, Skode, Szuriel, Zjar-Tovan Area 30-foot cone or 10-foot emanation Defense Reflex --- You swing a weapon you're holding, and the weapon magically multiplies into duplicates that swipe at all creatures in either a cone or an emanation. This flurry deals four dice of damage to creatures in the area. This damage has the same type as the weapon and uses the same die size. Determine the die size as if you were attacking with the weapon; for instance, if you were wielding a two-hand weapon in both hands, you'd use its two-hand damage die. Critical Success The creature is unaffected. Success The target takes half damage. Failure The target takes full damage. Critical Failure The target takes double damage and is subject to the weapon's critical specialization effect. --- Heightened (+1) Add another damage die.
